channel.title: Multiple quick-loads results in stack overflow
channel.description:
It's a minor issue, but one I thought I'd mention. Finally hit a point where I ended up having to quick-load quite a few times (a certain meeting with marines near the end-game) and after that 4th or 5th time it crapped out on me, tossed me back to desktop and fed me an overflow message.
No, didn't get a screenshot, going to try and make it happen again; but thought it worth mentioning just for the hell of having a look.
Otherwise it's been smooth sailing, can't wait for the second release.

item.title: Multiple quick-loads results in stack overflow
item.dc:creator: Langenscheiss
item.description:
I can kinda confirm this. I have not got an error message yet, but I once noticed that after a quickload, performance got really bad, indicating some kind of overflow.

Read full topic
item.source: Multiple quick-loads results in stack overflow
